name: Hentai Devil Puzzle
description:
"Hentai Devil Puzzle"All puzzle parts are randomly generated, you have to move the parts and build them in the correct order, so that they would be folded into the whole picture. This is a good old puzzle known to all as a tag.

In Game:
  • Pretty ladies.
  • Thematic design.
  • Music for every taste
  • Gallery with pictures from completed levels.
  • Leaderboard.
  • Hints in the form of numbering puzzle parts (can be turned on and off)
  • A large number of levels
  • Two modes 3x3 and 5x5)
